rules_text:
Multikicker {2}{G} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Corpse Dredger enters the battlefield, return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of times Corpse Dredger was kicked. Put a +1/+1 counter on Corpse Dredger for each creature card returned to your hand in this way.
